Text: yes this is actually the movie. video and audio quality are great. thanks so much to the uploader. so glad i don't have to try to contain my own autistic issues to go to a crowded movie theater to see this. mega thumbs up!

Hi guys,

This is Alonso Mayo, the Writer/Director of "The Story of Luke". I appreciate your interest in our little independent film and I invite you to watch it instantly in iTunes, Amazon, Google Play, Vudu and most major Cable On Demand providers. A group of very dedicated people worked hard on this film for a long time and we would very much appreciate your support.

For more info about our film visit: http://www.thestoryofluke.com/

Thanks,
Alonso Mayo
Writer/Director "The Story of Luke"

All,
Its $9.99 to purchase on the VOD services.

Alonso, 
I wonder why people like you don't list a site for donations. Would this be against some contract with one of the VOD providers? Also, can you divulge what percent of that $9.99 you would receive?
Not great quality but it's fine/watchable - maybe dvdscr quality, and there's some pop-ups during the first 10 minutes.
